name: Eco Denim
details: Sustainable denim made from organic cotton and recycled materials.

name: Organic Cotton
details: 100% organic cotton fabric, free from harmful pesticides and chemicals.

name: Bamboo Fabric
details: Eco-friendly fabric made from bamboo fibers, offering breathability and softness.

name: Recycled Polyester
details: Fabric created from recycled plastic bottles, reducing environmental waste.

name: Hemp Fabric
details: Durable and sustainable fabric made from hemp plants, requiring minimal water.

name: Tencel Lyocell
details: Soft and sustainable fabric made from sustainably sourced wood pulp.
